location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter acknowledges the receipt of the orders of the Government of Bombay, dated 17 November 1810. In response to these commands, William Bruce is forwarding a copy of the account disbursements (not present) on the account of 'HMM'. The letter further notes that the Acting Resident understands he is not to quit his station (i.e. Bushire) without the authorisation of the Bombay Government.
